title: Examination for license
context: [ยง468E-10] Examination for license. (a) Each applicant for licensure under this chapter shall take a written examination in accordance with procedures prescribed by the board. Standards for acceptable performance shall be established by the board. (b) Applicants for licensure shall be examined at a time and place and under such supervision as the board may determine. &copy; The board may examine in whatever theoretical or applied fields of speech pathology or audiology it considers appropriate and may examine with regard to a person&rsquo;s professional skills and judgment in the utilization of speech pathology or audiology techniques and methods. (d) The board shall maintain a permanent record of all examination scores. [L 1974, c 48, pt of ยง1] Cross References Disposal of examination records, see ยง94-5.
